passives.name: Shield Reaver
passives.effects: Dealing damage to an enemy champion inflicts them with venom for 3 seconds, reducing any {{tip|shield|shields}} they gain within the duration by {{rd|50%|35%}}, and if the target was not already afflicted by the venom, reducing all of their active shields by the same amount.

effects_structured.raw: Dealing damage to an enemy champion inflicts them with venom for 3 seconds, reducing any {{tip shield shields}} they gain within the duration by {{rd 50% 35%}}, and if the target was not already afflicted by the venom, reducing all of their active shields by the same amount.
